title: Flint And Steel
desc:
Post 1924
- Input an odd number to inflict **Burn 3** on an opponent.
- Alternatively, you may also play this if someone else played an <:inferno:1118594776716021780> card this round.
**Burn**: Each turn you have **Burn**, draw a card and reduce the **Burn** by 1.
A **Burn** stack is reduced by 2 if you play a ❄️ card with **Burn** active.
